entry.value: %%00010%%00010 # 1. Parameter selection%%00010%%00010 %%00010 numAttributeName = "erro";%%00010 plotTitle<-"my plot"%%00010 bins<-"20"%%00010 color<-"black"%%00010 yScale<-c("","")%%00010 xScale<-c("","")%%00010 probability<-TRUE%%00010 drawDensity<-TRUE%%00010 densityColor<-"black"%%00010%%00010 %%00010 # 2. r-code%%00010%%00010 %%00010 numAttribute = eval(parse(text = paste("kIn$\"", numAttributeName, "\"", sep = '')))%%00010 bins <- as.numeric(bins)%%00010%%00010 #define as numbers%%00010 yScale <- as.numeric(yScale)%%00010 xScale <- as.numeric(xScale)%%00010%%00010 #set scales to default and check scales%%00010 if (is.na(yScale[1]) | is.na(yScale[2])) %%00009yScale <- NULL%%00009%%00009#default%%00010 if (is.na(xScale[1]) | is.na(xScale[2])) %%00009xScale <- range(numAttribute)%%00009#default%%00010 if (probability) yScale <- NULL%%00010%%00010 #plot histogram%%00010 hist(numAttribute, density=30.0, angle=45, xlab=numAttributeName, main=plotTitle, breaks = bins, col = color, ylim = yScale, xlim = xScale, freq = !probability)%%00010%%00010 #plot density line%%00010 if (drawDensity) lines(density(numAttribute), col = densityColor)%%00010%%00010 %%00010

<de.mpicbg.knime.scripting.core.rgg.wizard.ScriptTemplate>%%00010 <scriptingLanguage></scriptingLanguage>%%00010 <author>Holger Brandl, Martin Stoeter</author>%%00010 <categories>%%00010 <string> basic</string>%%00010 <string>histograms</string>%%00010 </categories>%%00010 <description>Displays a histogram (distribution) of a numerical attribute.%%00010Allows modification of bins, axis, color, and optional probability density%%00010%%00010Options:%%00010- set number of bins: (default: 15)%%00010- set the x and y-axis limits (default: none (=automatic); min AND max values are neccessary, if you want to set limits)%%00010- y-axis is probability density (default: false (=frequency)%%00010- plot density line (default: false)%%00010- set color of histogram or line (default: black; see colors here http://research.stowers-institute.org/efg/R/Color/Chart/)</description>%%00010 <template><rgg>%%00010%%00010 <!--1. Title and short description -->%%00010%%00010 <h3 text="Histogram" aligment="center" span="full"/>%%00010%%00010 <separator label="Description" span="full"/>%%00010 <labelarea span="full">Displays a histogram (distribution) of a numerical attribute.%%00010Allows modification of bins, axis, color, and optional probability density%%00010%%00010Options:%%00010- set number of bins: (default: 15)%%00010- set the x and y-axis limits (default: none (=automatic); min AND max values are neccessary, if you want to set limits)%%00010- y-axis is probability density (default: false (=frequency)%%00010- plot density line (default: false)%%00010- set color of histogram or line (default: black; see colors here http://research.stowers-institute.org/efg/R/Color/Chart/)</labelarea>%%00010 <gaprow height="1"/>%%00010%%00010 <!-- 2. Configuration-->%%00010%%00010 <separator label="Options" span="full"/>%%00010 <gaprow height="2"/>%%00010%%00010 # 1. Parameter selection%%00010%%00010 <group>%%00010%%00010 numAttributeName = <combobox items="$$$NUM_ATTRIBUTES$$$" label="Variable of interest"/>;%%00010 <textfield label="Title of the plot:" var="plotTitle" data-type="text" default-value= "my plot" size="10" span="full"/>%%00010 <textfield label="Number of bins:" var="bins" data-type="number" default-value="15"/>%%00010 <textfield label="Color of histogram:" var="color" data-type="text" default-value= "black" size="5"/>%%00010 <vector label="y-axis scale:" var="yScale" size="2" vector-type="character"/>%%00010 <vector label="x-axis scale:" var="xScale" size="2" vector-type="character"/>%%00010 <checkbox label="Probability density" var="probability" selected="false"/>%%00010 <checkbox label="Draw density" var="drawDensity" selected="false"/>%%00010 <textfield label="Color of density line:" var="densityColor" data-type="text" default-value= "black" size="5"/>%%00010%%00010 </group>%%00010%%00010%%00010 # 2. r-code%%00010%%00010 <![CDATA[%%00010 numAttribute = eval(parse(text = paste("kIn$\"", numAttributeName, "\"", sep = '')))%%00010 bins <- as.numeric(bins)%%00010%%00010 #define as numbers%%00010 yScale <- as.numeric(yScale)%%00010 xScale <- as.numeric(xScale)%%00010%%00010 #set scales to default and check scales%%00010 if (is.na(yScale[1]) | is.na(yScale[2])) %%00009yScale <- NULL%%00009%%00009#default%%00010 if (is.na(xScale[1]) | is.na(xScale[2])) %%00009xScale <- range(numAttribute)%%00009#default%%00010 if (probability) yScale <- NULL%%00010%%00010 #plot histogram%%00010 hist(numAttribute, density=30.0, angle=45, xlab=numAttributeName, main=plotTitle, breaks = bins, col = color, ylim = yScale, xlim = xScale, freq = !probability)%%00010%%00010 #plot density line%%00010 if (drawDensity) lines(density(numAttribute), col = densityColor)%%00010%%00010 ]]>%%00010%%00010</rgg></template>%%00010 <persistedConfig>%%00010 <entry>%%00010 <string>y-axis scale:</string>%%00010 <list>%%00010 <string></string>%%00010 <string></string>%%00010 </list>%%00010 </entry>%%00010 <entry>%%00010 <string>Probability density</string>%%00010 <boolean>true</boolean>%%00010 </entry>%%00010 <entry>%%00010 <string>Draw density</string>%%00010 <boolean>true</boolean>%%00010 </entry>%%00010 <entry>%%00010 <string>Number of bins:</string>%%00010 <string>20</string>%%00010 </entry>%%00010 <entry>%%00010 <string>x-axis scale:</string>%%00010 <list>%%00010 <string></string>%%00010 <string></string>%%00010 </list>%%00010 </entry>%%00010 <entry>%%00010 <string>Color of density line:</string>%%00010 <string>black</string>%%00010 </entry>%%00010 <entry>%%00010 <string>Color of histogram:</string>%%00010 <string>black</string>%%00010 </entry>%%00010 <entry>%%00010 <string>Title of the plot:</string>%%00010 <string>my plot</string>%%00010 </entry>%%00010 <entry>%%00010 <string>Variable of interest</string>%%00010 <string>erro</string>%%00010 </entry>%%00010 </persistedConfig>%%00010 <name>Histogram</name>%%00010 <linkedToScript>true</linkedToScript>%%00010 <previewURL>https://raw.githubusercontent.com/knime-mpicbg/scripting-templates/master/knime-scripting-templates/R/simple_histogram.png</previewURL>%%00010
